input_args.passage: "the Taliban | the Taliban, The battle took place between November 25 and December 1, 2001, in northern Afghanistan. It followed the intervention by United States-led coalition forces to overthrow the Taliban's Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, which had been harboring al-Qaeda operatives. Johnny Micheal Spann's memorial at Qala-i-Jangi in 2007., al-Qaeda"
input_args.claim: "The first source mentions that the Battle of Qala-i-Jangi took place in northern Afghanistan and it followed the intervention by United States-led coalition forces to overthrow the Taliban's Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, which had been harboring al-Qaeda operatives."
